          <title>
            <string language="fr">La dégradation des atomes de potassium-40</string>
            <string language="en">The decay of potassium-40 atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zerfall der Atome potassium-40</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A deterioração dos átomos potassium-40</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il deperimento degli atomi potassium-40</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποσύνθεση κάλιο- 40 ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El decaimiento de los átomos potassium-40</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre que quand les atomes de potassium-40 se dégradent ils produisent des atomes d'argon-40 stables.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when potassium-40 atom decay, they produce stable argon-40 atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Âge</string>
            <string language="en">Age</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">atomes d'argon-40</string>
            <string language="en">argon-40 atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die, wenn Zerfall des Atoms
potassium-40, sie beständige Atome argon-40 produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra aquela quando a 
deterioração do átomo potassium-40, eles produz os átomos argon-40
estáveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quella quando il 
deperimento dell'atomo potassium-40, produce gli atomi stabili 
argon-40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν αποσύνθεση 
κάλιο- 40 ατόμων, παράγουν σταθερά αργό- 40 άτομα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra eso cuando el 
decaimiento del átomo potassium-40, ellos produce los átomos 
estables argon-40.</string>
          </description>
